content.rendered:
Neon Rider by Famobi GmbH is a fast-paced motorbike game where you race through neon-lit tracks, dodging obstacles and performing tricks. This guide will help you zoom past the competition and become a Neon Rider master!

Taking Control:

  • Accelerate: Neon Rider is all about speed! Tap or click the screen to propel your bike forward.
  • Steering: Maintain balance by tilting your phone or using the arrow keys (on PC) to lean left or right.
  • Color Matching: The key to staying on track is matching your bike’s color to the neon road. Use the designated button or arrow keys to switch colors quickly. Remember, blue tracks are always safe for your bike.

Mastering the Ride:

  • Perfect Landings: Don’t just land, stick the landing! Smooth landings after jumps or flips earn you bonus points.
  • Tricky Techniques: Flips and spins are more than just stylish; they rack up points. But be careful! Crashing means game over. Practice finding the right balance for airtime and smooth landings.
  • Boosting with Batteries: Keep an eye out for batteries on the track. Grabbing them activates a fire mode, giving you a temporary speed boost to zoom past obstacles.

Conquering the Neon Tracks:

  • Navigating Obstacles: The neon world is full of surprises! Watch out for ramps, gaps, and other hazards that can send you crashing. Time your jumps carefully and use your speed to your advantage.
  • Practice Makes Perfect: Neon Rider’s tracks get progressively challenging. Don’t get discouraged if you wipe out a few times. Keep playing, learn the patterns, and you’ll master them in no time.
  • The Minimap is Your Friend: Use the minimap to your advantage. It provides a sneak peek of upcoming obstacles and color changes, allowing you to plan your maneuvers.

Bonus Tips:

  • Find the Flow: Focus on maintaining a steady rhythm. Speed is important, but staying in control is key to reaching the goal.
  • Don’t Be Afraid to Brake: While speed is tempting, use the brake (by swiping down on the screen or using the S key) to avoid missing color changes or overshooting jumps.
  • Enjoy the Ride: Neon Rider is all about having fun! Crank up the volume, enjoy the neon lights, and see how far you can take your neon motorbike adventure!
